message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $120 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110. What do you think?
